about.me: Cardano-TH is an efficient and secure Stake Pool allowing you to easily participate in the functioning of the Cardano blockchain. Our target is to build a community in Thailand, to give knowledge about Cardano blockchain to Thai people, and to become one of decentralized parts. Once we get % margin fee, which will be voted by community, and we will donate all of %  margin fee to charities, https://www.thaichildrights.org/ and http://www.warawannursinghome.com/
about.server: VM google cloud USA server & Raspberry Pi passive node at my Home in Bangkok Thailand
